text: This is a pretty good location with decent pizza. I used to come here all the time until I found Mountain Mikes just west of this location. Mountain Mikes makes hands down the Best Pizza one can find in South Jordan.

name: Danyon Greymoon
text: Pretty good pizza, good service, good sides, and amazing dessert! I don't want to know how many calories are in their cookie pizza, but all I do know is that it's the best thing to have with a glass of wine while watching rom coms with the wife at home. I personally haven't had a bad experience here so here's 5 stars!

text: DON'T ORDER PIZZA FROM HERE. I ordered a veggie pizza because of religious restrictions, and there was a piece of meat on my pizza. They should be more careful when assembling the pizza. I was disgusted by the pizza I got today. I won't be ordering from here again, or maybe never.

text: Service is okay. The pizza is, of course, great (I still think Domino's is 10X better). The service time is pretty abysmal and they often forget to put your dipping sauce in the bag, but other than that I don't have any other serious complaints.
